keys: contra las novelas de las cosas

          <language>en</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Genre - Task 3 (Literature)</string>
            <string language="en">Genre - Task 3 (Literature)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Genre - Aufgabe 3 (Literatur)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Genre - Chargez 3 (Littérature)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Genre - Tarefa 3 (Literatura)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Genere - Operazione 3 (Letteratura)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύφος - στοιχειώδης εργασία 3 (λογοτεχνία)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Género - Tarea 3 (Literatura)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Your task here is to read two novels from one of the genres presented in the library and write an essay comparing, contrasting and analysing the two novels.Module 5 - Literature.English C.</string>
            <string language="en">Your task here ice to read two novels pious one of the genre's present curse in the library wild duck write an essay comparing, contra things wild duck analyzing the two novels.

Module 5 - Literature.

English C.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sv">contrasting novels</string>

            <string language="en">writing</string>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ihre Aufgabe hier gefrieren, um zwei Romane pious 
zu lesen vom anwesenden Fluch des Genren in der Bibliothek, die wilde 
Ente einen Versuch schreiben, der vergleicht, gegen die wilde Ente der
Sachen, welche die zwei novels.Module 5 - Literature.English C 
analysiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Votre chargez ici la glace pour lire deux 
romans les pieux de la malédiction actuelle du genre dans la 
bibliothèque le canard que sauvage écrivent un essai comparant, 
contre le canard sauvage de choses analysant les deux novels.Module 5 
- Literature.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sua tarefa aqui congela para ler duas novelas a 
pious do curse atual do genre na biblioteca que o pato selvagem 
escreve um essay que compara, contra o pato selvagem das coisas que 
analisa os dois novels.Module 5 - Literature.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La vostra operazione qui ghiaccia per leggere due 
romanzi quello pious del curse del presente di genere nella 
libreria che l'anatra selvaggia scrive un saggio che confronta, contra
l'anatra selvaggia di cose che analizza i due novels.Module 5 - 
Literature.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο στοιχειώδης εδώ πάγος σας για να διαβάσει σε δύο 
μυθιστορήματα ευσεβής μια από την παρούσα πληγή του ύφους στην 
άγρια πάπια βιβλιοθηκών γράφει ένα δοκίμιο συγκρίνοντας, 
ενάντια άγρια πάπια πραγμάτων που αναλύει την ενότητα 5 δύο 
μυθιστορημάτων - λογοτεχνία αγγλικό γ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Su tarea aquí hiela para leer dos novelas la 
piadosa de la maldición del presente del género en la biblioteca 
que el pato salvaje escribe un ensayo que compara, contra el pato 
salvaje de las cosas que analiza los dos novels.Module 5 - 
Literature.English C.</string>
          </description>
